actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to extend the term of two design patents numbered 191,069 (dated August 8, 1961) and 191,770 (dated November 14, 1961) for bottles, granted to Louis Schacher, Dennis F. Wheeler, and John F. Drum.

summary.text: Extends the term of two design patents numbered 191,069 (dated August 8, 1961) and 191,770 (dated November 14, 1961) for bottles, granted to Louis Schacher, Dennis F. Wheeler, and John F. Drum.

titles.title: A bill to extend the term of two design patents numbered 191,069 (dated August 8, 1961) and 191,770 (dated November 14, 1961) for bottles, granted to Louis Schacher, Dennis F. Wheeler, and John F. Drum.
